short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast access to quality web search through Default Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search assistant for nice search experience. Allow this search extension Morty search to configure your default search settings!
By configuring your browsers default search setting to redirect your searches to mortysearch.com is how the Morty Search extension assists you in upgrading your search experience.

Please Read Carefully: By clicking on the *ADD TO CHROME* button in the top right hand corner and installing the Morty Search extension, you are agreeing to install this extension, you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy, and you are agreeing to our End User License Agreement.

Privacy Policy:
http://www.mortysearch.com/privacy/

End User License Agreement:
http://www.mortysearch.com/terms/

Contact Us:
http://www.mortysearch.com/contact/

At any time you may remove or uninstall this extension and the guide on how to is down below.

How To Uninstall This Extension:
1. Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right hand corner of your browser. 
2. Click on "More tools" and then in the menu that appears click on "Extensions". 
3. From the list of installed extensions, find this extension, then click on the trash can icon that is to the right of the extension name.
Morty Search extension should now be removed from your browser.
